function_call.name: classify_risks_framework
function_call.arguments: {"sorted_risks":[{"name":"Global deployment of covid-19 tracking apps","category":"Tools&Apps","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Potential privacy and security risks associated with monitoring and tracking of infected individuals’ data through iot","category":"Security","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Reliance on iot for monitoring critical health data could lead to data inaccuracies and errors","category":"Health","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Overreliance on iot technology may lead to neglect of essential non-technological intervention measures","category":"Health","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Challenges in implementing wbe for infectious disease surveillance","category":"Health","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Stigmatism and distrust in health services resulting in efforts to hide cases of contagious diseases ebola, sars, influenza, tuberculosis","category":"Health","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Misuse and misrepresentation of wbe data","category":"Health","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Sampling from smaller subgroups leading to stigmatization","category":"Health","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Differences in outbreak handling between developing and developed countries","category":"Health","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Complex relationship between antibiotic concentrations and resistance in wastewater","category":"Health","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Underexplored areas of antimicrobial resistance genes args in wastewater","category":"Health","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Seasonal variations in antibiotic resistance genes args in wastewater","category":"Health","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Prevalence of antimicrobial resistance genes args in influent wastewater","category":"Health","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Lack of population-scale epidemiological information for amr surveillance","category":"Health","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Correlations between antibiotic levels and abundance of args in wastewater","category":"Health","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Antiviral drugs like tamiflu and relenza are stockpiled globally and deployed during pandemics, leading to high proportions of communities taking the drugs in a short time window, resulting in the drugs and their metabolites being present in wastewater.","category":"Health","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Antiviral drugs, if present in low levels in the environment, could cause irreversible effects to viral genomes, leading to resistance.","category":"Health","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Presence of antiviral drugs and their metabolized forms in wastewater streams contribute to environmental contamination and potential long-term impacts on microbial resistance.","category":"Health","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Limited understanding of antibiotic consumption in the community","category":"Health","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Lack of focus on antibiotic metabolites in wastewater analysis","category":"Health","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Unclear impact of antibiotic usage on bacterial communities in wwtps","category":"Health","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Limited understanding of proteins in wastewater","category":"Health","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Lack of investigation into stability of proteins in sewage systems","category":"Health","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Unmonitored antimicrobial usage within a community","category":"Health","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of standardization in metagenomics protocols","category":"Health","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Inadequate utilization of urine proteomics for disease biomarkers","category":"Health","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Limited integration of urinary biomarkers in wastewater-based epidemiology wbe","category":"Health","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Challenges in assessing polio through sewage samples","category":"Health","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Use of wastewater to detect pathogenic organisms may lead to misinterpretation of disease prevalence in the community.","category":"Health","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Historical data from wastewater surveillance may not accurately predict future disease outbreaks.","category":"Health","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Use of water fingerprinting for community-wide infectious disease diagnostics","category":"Health","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Wide array of endogenous chemical and biological urinary biomarkers linked with disease","category":"Health","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Limitations of wastewater-based epidemiology wbe techniques for biomarker selection","category":"Health","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Possible transmission of contagious diseases through wastewater and surface water","category":"Health","confidence":"High"},{"name":"International collaboration leading to global propagation of contagious diseases","category":"Health","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Exposure to endogenous biomarkers may reveal information about community health status and disease prevalence","category":"Health","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Possible transmission of contagious diseases through untreated wastewater","category":"Health","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of accurate interpretation of biomarkers in wastewater, leading to misrepresentation of community health and lifestyle habits.","category":"Health","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of comprehensive data collection on the emergence and re-emergence of diseases, and threat of drug-resistant pathogens","category":"Health","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Bias, resource insensitivity, and high costs in existing surveillance methods","category":"Health","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Rising cases of fungal and viral resistances posing significant threats","category":"Health","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Limitations in current infection disease surveillance techniques","category":"Health","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Emerging infectious diseases caused by novel pathogenic organisms","category":"Health","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inappropriate usage of antimicrobials leading to drug-resistant pathogens","category":"Health","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Reliance on a single model abm for simulating epidemiological and economical effects","category":"Tools&Apps","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Ineffective epidemiological control with il = 0.5","category":"Health","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Availability of source code and package may lead to unauthorized modifications or misuse of the simulation model.","category":"Security","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Frequent ’business contact’ between a1 and a3 agents increases the risk of disease transmission in the population.","category":"Health","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Monthly ’accounting’ actions involve economic transactions and payment of taxes, increasing the potential for disease transmission during in-person interactions.","category":"Health","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Complexity of the model and economic interactions can lead to improper consideration of disease transmission and risk management.","category":"Health","confidence":"High"}]}
